verses.verse: <S%H430>Hurry,<s%> God, to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H2363>me.<s%> Come quickly to <S%H5833>help<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh.

Let them be <S%H954>disappointed<s%> and <S%H2659>confounded<s%> who <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H5315>soul.<s%> Let those who <S%H2655>desire<s%> my <S%H7451>ruin<s%> be <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> in <S%H3637>disgrace.<s%>
Let them be <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H6118>because<s%> of their <S%H1322>shame<s%> Who <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1889>"Aha!<s%> <S%H1889>Aha!<s%>"

Let all those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> you <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in <S%H157>you.<s%> Let those who love your <S%H3444>salvation<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> "Let <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H1431>exalted!<s%>"

But I am <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy.<s%> Come to me <S%H2363>quickly,<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%> You are my <S%H5828>help<s%> and my <S%H6403>deliverer.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H309>don't<s%> delay.
